授業目的: Building on Reading I, this course aims to improve English reading skills and build vocabulary knowledge. In intensive reading, students will read nonfiction articles with a focus on improving both general understanding and specific reading skills. The course will also provide other reading opportunities, including readings aimed at improving reading fluency without the aid of dictionaries (“extended readings”) and readings to extend reading skills and knowledge of previously studied materials.
到達目標:
At the end of the semester, students should be able to:

use specific reading skills and general comprehension to understand readings,

be able to read both longer texts and shorter intensive texts more fluently

understand vocabulary frequently used for nonfiction articles.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
